pullRequest.title: feat(core): filter developer menu logs by log level
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available: N/A
Description of changes: On the developer menu, adds the ability to filter the logs by log level (in addition to searching the logs).

commit.message: filter dev menu logs by log level

nodes.bodyText: This is a perfect place to use a Switch statement instead of the if else chain.
What's the purpose for setting the placeholder text first before setting it to getFilteredLogs?

commit.message: use menu item title to retrieve log level
